sentence.Network_en: He behaved boorishly at the party.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在聚会上的表现很粗俗.

sentence.Network_en: In this lies, people unscrupulously drink, act boorishly to perhaps fish for fame.
sentence.Network_cn: 于这个谎言中, 人们恣意喝酒 、 撒野或者沽名钓誉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He behaved boorishly at the party ., 他在聚会上的表现很粗俗.

means.word_mean: 1. like a boor, "he behaved boorishly at the party"

auth_sentence.content: Holding forth boorishly on philosophical themes was a favorite occupation, as was proclaiming his hatred of polite society.
